com.twitter.heron.scheduler.util

Class DefaultConfigLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.scheduler.util.DefaultConfigLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuroraConfigLoader, Base64ConfigLoader, LocalConfigLoader, MesosConfigLoader

    public class DefaultConfigLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConfig
    Loads config file in Java properties file format.

      • load

        public boolean load(java.lang.String configFile,
           java.lang.String configOverride)
        Description copied from interface: IConfig
        Loads config file from disk.
        Specified by:
        load in interface IConfig
        Parameters:
        configFile - location of scheduler config file.
        configOverride - Commandline overrides passed to submitter. The override is encoded as String. SubmitterMain and SchedulerMain will pass all extra arguments as override.
        Returns:
        true, If successful in loading config. False if config verify failed.

      • getSchedulerLocation

        public java.lang.String getSchedulerLocation(SchedulerServer schedulerServer)
        Description copied from interface: IConfig
        Returns scheduler DNS address. This could be host:port or a dns address for http rest exported by scheduler.
        Specified by:
        getSchedulerLocation in interface IConfig
        Parameters:
